snippet: The Knicks are aiming for a slow rebuild of their roster, a revamp that will continue over the next couple of weeks as their summer-league team competes in five games.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are aiming for a slow rebuild of their roster, a revamp that will continue over the next couple of weeks as their summer-league team competes in five games.

headline.main: Overhauled Knicks Set to Take the Court
headline.print_headline: Overhauled Knicks Set to Take the Court
